pages.text: Bundenbachiellus is an over 20 cm-long arthropod known from Devonian Hunsr√ºck Slate, Germany. This animal is known from two specimens, large specimen which lacks anterior part, and a smaller complete specimen once named
. It lacked eyes, and probably used its whip-like appendages as antennae.
